summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account during March 2017. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant transactions such as a large incoming transfer and an outgoing payment to Bank of America.

persons.name: Stewart Ohlfield
persons.context: Stewart Ohlfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account details.

persons.name: Lawrence P Vloski
persons.context: Lawrence P Vloski is mentioned as the recipient of a $50,000 outgoing transfer to Bank of America.

events.title: Beginning Balance
events.description: The account had a beginning balance of $1,000.00 as of March 1, 2017.

events.title: Incoming Transfer
events.description: An incoming transfer of $1,132,731.96 was recorded on March 10, 2017.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $50,000.00 to Lawrence P Vloski was made on March 28, 2017.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details account transactions for March 2017, including a beginning balance of $1,000.00.
A significant incoming transfer of $1,132,731.96 occurred on March 10, 2017.
An outgoing transfer of $50,000.00 was made to Lawrence P Vloski on March 28, 2017.
The account had no service charges or overdraft fees during the statement period.
Stewart Ohlfield is the contact person for inquiries related to the account.
